name: Onur Demirörs
content: Onur Demirörs - Computer Engineering Department Computer Engineering Department Izmir Institute of Technology Search Computer Engineering Department Izmir Institute of Technology Home About People Research Research Focus Projects Publications Collaborations Education Undergraduate Program MS Programs CENG MS Program SEDS MS Program PhD Program Minor Program Contact lidya multisite > Computer Engineering Department > Chair > Onur Demirörs Onur Demirörs Onur Demirörs Professor / Chair Prof. Dr. Onur Demirörs received his B.Sc. in Computer Engineering from Middle East Technical University. He got two M.Sc. degrees; one from Ege University in Izmir in 1990 and another from Southern Methodist University, Dallas Texas, USA in 1993. He received is Ph.D degree in the latter in 1995. After a lengthy and productive academic experience in the Southern Methodist University, Dokuz Eylul University and Middle East Technical University, he started at our department in 2017. His research areas include software process improvement, process models: methods, tools, techniques, business process management, software quality management, software measurement, software project management and conceptual modelling.
